data.text: @umisef @Jessied75235626 @NSWHealth @ClareCraigPath And I'll be like, "but hun, don't you think I deserve better?". And you will be like, "stop bitching about these people who worked so hard to grow that Apple so you could have something to eat!". And I'll be just a whiny little bitch to you. Just because I wanted a better apple.

@umisef @Jessied75235626 @NSWHealth @ClareCraigPath I did, didn't I. I was so tempted to. I imagined you being out there sad and lonely. And how we could just sit there and watch the sunset without uttering a single word. Then realised you will argue with me over being disappointed that the apple we bought was bitter.

@umisef @Jessied75235626 @NSWHealth @ClareCraigPath He had a great life. My outlook in life was greatly affected by all the hardships I had to endure and all the sufferings I watched unfold before my very eyes. So, I understand why you are so different from me in many aspects.
@Immasayitlikeso @Jessied75235626 @NSWHealth @ClareCraigPath Oh so harsh --- and to think you almost asked me to marry you so very, very recently. McCartney was on to something...

@umisef @Jessied75235626 @NSWHealth @ClareCraigPath I don't really care if you think little of me at all tbh. I don't think I'm better than anyone, especially this *bunch* you kept referring to. I think they are all entitled to their own choice and opinions especially since these affect their lives and those they care about.

@Immasayitlikeso @Jessied75235626 @NSWHealth @ClareCraigPath too bad...

But to me it seems, and I would be surprised if I were wrong on it, that you have the *potential* to be so much better than you are in your relationship with Covid information and data. And wasted potential is a lot more frustrating than mere stupidity.

@Immasayitlikeso @Jessied75235626 @NSWHealth @ClareCraigPath if you used the smarts that you have to intellectually engage.

That sets you apart from, say, Jessie, who gives every indication of being just as stupid himself as the stuff he spews forth; And while the "spewing forth" part is unfortunate, it's the nature of "social", so

@Immasayitlikeso @Jessied75235626 @NSWHealth @ClareCraigPath Conversely, of the whole bunch, you come across as the smartest one. So it is highly disappointing that you refuse to actually *think* about *facts*, and instead simply form "opinions" based on feelings --- and yet consider those as relevant and valuable as what you could get to
@umisef @Jessied75235626 @NSWHealth @ClareCraigPath Nah, I'm not taking any advice from you.
